ethereumsection.h3: Link existing TLDR, ELI5 to the source
ethereumsection.p: Curate a list of crypto ELI5s from twitter, reddit, telegram and link them where they are relevant. Like a crowdsourced ethereum twitter account, linked to ethereum.org.

ethereumsection.h3: Improve open source projects as non-coder

ethereumsection.p: Trust score. Investment ratings. Security ratings. Entertainment value. Service score. Rate anything. Help metamask to keep their phishing database up to date. And view your friends ratings.

ethereumsection.h3: Share your address book with friends
ethereumsection.p: Share your address book with friends, access database of labelled addresses and send money to users via their github or twitter name.
Experienced Ethereum commmunity members link content, creating context for the ones who just start out. Newbs upvote and mentors gain reputation - purely anonymous and onchain.

beyondsection.p: Exchange p2p recommendations: videos, music, restaurants, longread, movie. Add and receive content similar to the one you currently view.
Personalize websites. Follow lists like "darkmode anywhere" and edit the css of your favorite website.
Know another source, which says the opposite? Post it and get rewarded
Better data for brave ads. Allow anyone to put ads anywhere and match them with viewers. Users price the viewing time. Allowing for variable pricing.
